comment: I love this professor!!!!! She was the absolute best!!! If you have the opportunity to take her consider yourself very fortunate!!!! TAKE HER CLASS!!!! We had 5 grades 1 paper, 3 test, and attendance. She goes over what is important about the test the class before so all you have to do is take notes and you can easily make an A.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Good teacher, very nice and sweet. Means well for all, but class is slightly boring! Watch a movie, read a couple of books, but mainly all we did ALL semester was write 1 paper, and she stretched it out over the whole semester. But I would reccomend her, she's a lil quirky, but most english teachers are. She is very nice and understanding!
her tellings and doings are not matched at the end of semester.
